page.title: 03King George V Reservoir
page.content: The block is split north/south by the{ {King George V Reservoir}which is part of the{Lee Valley Park.} The main purpose of the reservoir is the supply of water for both{drinking {by the population and for industrial {processes.} The large expanse of water is also used for{recreation,}Chingford Sailing Club being based at the southern end of the reservoir.The water also attracts large flocks of{wildfowl} particularly during the winter months when it is an important roost.Some of the birds are attracted by the stocks of fish which also attract local anglers.
